body:
Comment 3: 
I run your program (http://pastie.org/2864265) on current tip, and I can't see any
problem. You said it crashes with "out of memory" error, but I waited for a while and it
just runs.

You said that your program "consume large amounts memory and never release it". How do
you measure that?

I need your help to reproduce the problem you are seeing. Thank you.

Alex
_Owner changed to @alexbrainman._ _Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
